features: 🎁️25-IN-1 MONTESSORI TOY - Guolely Montessori toy helps kids natural learning through play. Features 25 Montessori toddler activities, including zippers, shoelaces, buttons, belt buckles, jigsaw puzzles, alphabet, clocks and calendar learning games. Safe preschool learning activities for quiet play and develop fine motor skills, dressing skills, finger dexterity, and cognitive skill.

🎁️ORIGINAL DESIGN BUSY BOARD – Upgraded Designed with more sections and more fun. Compared with other busy boards, ours is based on the original basic life skills learning section, and adds the jigsaw puzzle game, the color and shape recognition section, alphabet section respectively, and clocks & calendar learning games.

🎁️ SAFE EDUCATIONAL TOY - Safe Educational Toy for 1-6 year old toddlers, including autistic. Made made of soft felted wool, ABS material，which is soft, no harm to child. It is very durable and all pieces on the busy board are securely fixed. Keep your kids busy and safe, you can enjoy your time for hours!

🎁️ EXCELLENT TRAVEL TOY – Thanks to the lightweight and compact design, the child can easily put it in the backpack and take it anywhere he/she wants. Car activities & airplane activities travel toys for toddlers that will keep your kids busy and quiet during the long journey.

🎁️PERFECT GIFT FOR KIDS - This Montessori busy board is uniquely designed with dinosaurs elements and 26 kinds of animal-shaped English letters to appeal to any child. It is a perfect gift for 1-6 years old toddlers as Birthday, Carnival Prize, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Contest prizes. Surprise your kids with our amazing busy board.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Travel
reviews.reviewText: I busted this out for a plane ride with my 2 year old and it captured his attention really well. It's colorful and looks well made. I plan to keep this for "special occasions" so that it will always keep his interest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute, well made, travel friendly educational and FUN !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kidd love playing with this activity center. It's fun and portable. The zipper and snaps are a big hit! Great for fine motor skills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little toy
reviews.reviewText: Great toy. Thus us made with quality materials and is easy to carry around. The book style design makes it perfect for car rides. It sits in son's lap and he can work on all the tasks built in. It stays on his lap easily. It entertains him nicely. Great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had recently bought this for my 2 year old. And I can't help but think that this is such a great product for children especially for children who have Early Intervention. This is great and I also enjoy playing with my 2 year old. Worth the money. I'm very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel toy for 2-4 year old.
reviews.reviewText: This toy is self contained, light weight & packs easily. I bought it for a 2 1/2 year old going on a 2 hour flight,& it was kept him happy & busy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good but a bit cheap
reviews.reviewText: I thought my 2 year old would LOVE this but they weren’t very interested lol. Maybe for 5 min and then they got bored unfortunately. We use it for the car but I think other children might like this so I rated it 5 stars. It is a little cheap so it falls apart and can be a choking hazard so keep that in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material was a little cheap
reviews.reviewText: Cute concept. Feel the material is a little cheap.
